CONCRETE CONSTRUCTION

SUMMARY

A highly experienced professional who possess the required level of retail management know how needed to inspire, lead, develop and motivate staff.
There by helping them to achieve outstanding results through passion, innovation and support.
Key qualities include innovation in product range and responsiveness to market trends, as well as being able to give superb product knowledge and training to junior staff so they can deliver industry leading advice and service to customers.
Also having a real passion for retailing, with a strong desire to exceed customer expectations.
Currently looking for a suitable position with an exciting retailer who promotes from within and rewards achievers.
Highlights
Professional Familiar with a computerized warehouse system.
Able to work at elevated heights up to 30 feet.
Maintaining a clean, organized and safe work environment.
Ability to organize and prioritize job tasks and requirements.
Establishing safety procedures.
Accurately interpreting instructions.
Demonstrating integrity and respect to senior managers at all times.
Personal  Physically fit and able to work in hot or cold environments.
Possessing math proficiency and strong communication skills.
Excellent organizational, time management and customer relations skills.

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Over Exceeding Award
Successfully completed the company's rigorous employee development program.
Commended for having a perfect attendance for 10 months.
Promoted to supervisor after a year of employment.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Civil Estimator - 1883589

Location: New Rochelle, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
About Us:

Infrastructure is the backbone of society, playing a vital role in ensuring safety, enhancing quality of life, and fostering economic growth. Our company has been at the forefront of building and renovating the nation's infrastructure for over a century, delivering projects that are essential to public service.

Our expertise encompasses constructing and upgrading roadways, bridges, tunnels, mass transit networks, and facilities for water and wastewater management. We're committed to making essential services more efficient and effective, backed by our unwavering commitment to ethical business practices, financial stability, and a track record of successful project delivery.

We're involved in significant projects nationwide, such as major transit system expansions, tunnel constructions for alleviating traffic, transformative rail system upgrades, and extensive airport and bridge enhancements. Working with us means being part of impactful projects like these, which contribute significantly to community development.

Key Responsibilities:

In this role, reporting to the Senior Estimation Manager, you will be tasked with:

 Crafting detailed cost projections for various civil infrastructure projects including bridges, highways, railways, airports, dams, and tunnels. Examining and fully comprehending project bids, blueprints, and technical documents. Independently conducting or overseeing detailed quantity assessments for various project types, compiling data using spreadsheet software. Creating detailed price estimates by determining workforce needs, equipment, and materials, utilizing advanced cost estimation software, with HCSS being the preferred tool.


Qualifications:

 A Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field from an accredited college or university, with over 10 years of experience in estimation and project management. A minimum of 5 years of experience in cost estimation for large-scale civil engineering projects. Experience with projects valued at $100 million or above. Strong interpersonal skills for effective communication with project stakeholders, suppliers, and subcontractors, from the pre-bid phase to post-bid discussions. Ability to collaborate seamlessly with a team of estimators to deliver comprehensive cost proposals, especially for large-scale, joint venture projects. Experience with project delivery methods like design-build and CMAR is advantageous.


This position offers a salary range of $150,000 to $225,000, commensurate with experience.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
